name: boosterWindStrengthMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the wind strength mode on a connected SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the wind strength mode.

parameters.name: predefinedBoosterWindStrengthMode
parameters.description: The predefined wind strength mode to set.
